Author: livcosima
Text: I’m worried about this too. I’ve been restricting a lot and when I’m not restricting I’m binging, but no purging. By the time I get my blood work done (scheduled for December) I’ll have been restricting for a while straight. Will they be able to tell this via the blood work? That I’m hardly eating?

Author: _Fr0gg0_
Text: Drink Gatorade and also take some multivitamins daily from now until you go.   The vitamins wont have calories but will still give you what your body needs.
